//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 AmbientColorAndSkyFactor;
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 DiffuseOverrideParameter;
//   float4 LightColorAndFalloffExponent;
//   float4 MinZ_MaxZRatio;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_0;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   sampler2D ShadowWarpFunctionTexture;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_1;
//   float3 UpperSkyColor;
//   sampler2D VAOBuffer;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   DNEResolution                c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias      c1       1
//   MinZ_MaxZRatio               c2       1
//   NvStereoEnabled              c3       1
//   DiffuseOverrideParameter     c4       1
//   UniformPixelVector_0         c7       1
//   UniformPixelVector_1         c8       1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c9       1
//   UpperSkyColor                c10      1
//   AmbientColorAndSkyFactor     c11      1
//   ShadowWarpFunctionTexture    s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture           s1       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0             s2       1
//   VAOBuffer                    s3       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c5, 1, 0.5, 0.0625, 0
    dcl_color1 v0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord v1.xy
    dcl_texcoord5 v2.w
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3

// Redundant Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --auto-fix-unreal-dne-reflection --only-autofixed --ignore-parse-errors CRC32_4CBAB83F_6562659.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

    dp3_pp r0.x, v0, v0
    rsq_pp r0.x, r0.x
    mad r0.yz, vPos.xxyw, c0.xxyw, c0.xzww
    mul r1.xy, r0.yzzw, v2.w
    texld r2, v1, s2
    mad r0.x, v0.z, r0.x, c5.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c5.y
    mul r0.xyz, r2, r0.x
    mul r0.xyz, r0, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r0, c8
    mov r2.x, c5.x
    add r2.xyz, r2.x, -c7
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r0, r2
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0, c4.w, c4
    mul r2.xyz, r0, c10
    mov_pp r0.w, c11.w
    mad_pp r2.xyz, r2, r0.w, c7
    abs r0.w, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r3, c5.zwzw, s1
      add r2.w, -r3.y, v2.w
      mad r1.z, r3.x, r2.w, r1.x
      mov r1.w, v2.w
      mov r3.xyz, r1.zyww
    else
      mov r3.xyz, c5.w
    endif
    mov r1.z, v2.w
    cmp r1.xyz, -r0.w, r1, r3
    rcp r0.w, r1.z
    mul r1.xy, r0.w, r1
    mad r1.xy, r1, c1, c1.wzzw
    texld_pp r1, r1, s3
    texld_pp r3, c5, s0
    mul r1.yzw, r0.xxyz, r3.x
    mul_pp r1.yzw, r1, c9.xxyz
    mad_pp r1.xyz, r2, r1.x, r1.yzww
    mad_pp oC0.xyz, r0, c11, r1
    rcp r0.x, v2.w
    mad oC0.w, c2.x, r0.x, c2.y

// approximately 42 instruction slots used (4 texture, 38 arithmetic)
